                                                                    Current page:  PHOTO
                                        
    		Welcome to CMT Photography
    	Whether you need photography for your next web update, a brochure, or poster, our talented photographers are available. We work directly with academic departments and administrative offices to create photographs, including professional portraits, for a variety of needs. Contact the Photography Studio at 530-898-6114, or send an e-mail to set up a photo session.Photo ToursTake a photo tour through one of our curated Flickr photo albums from our award-winning staff photographers who are both Chico State alumni!For more great photos, find us on Instagram:@chicostate Information TechnologyMeriam Library, Room 338www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeYou might be looking for...Classroom Technology ServicesStudent Print CenterGraphic DesignMedia ProductionsPhotographyPrint ServicesPresentation and Environmental GraphicsWeb ServicesInformation Technology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
